Package it.reexon.reexon.lib.security.crypt.algorithmics

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AESCrypt
    This is the Advanced Encryption Standard (using the Rijndael block cipher) approved by NIST.
    DESCrypt
    DES (the Data Encryption Standard) is a symmetric block cipher developed by IBM.
    HMACCrypt
    HMAC is a hashing method that uses a key in conjunction with an algorithm such as MD5 or SHA-1.
    HSHCrypt
    A 'hash algorithm' is used for computing a condensed representation of a fixed length message/file.
    MD5Crypt
    MD5 is a hashing algorithm that takes a message of up to 264 bits and reduces it to a digest of 128 bits (16 bytes).
    RSACrypt  
    SecureRandomAlgorithmics  
    SHACrypt
    SHA-1 is a hashing algorithm similar in structure to MD5, but producing a digest of 160 bits (20 bytes).
